text: Before children learn to speak, they often show signs of understanding by responding to familiar words and phrases. Below are some common examples - does your child do any of these?
In the list below, please mark the phrases that your child seems to understand.
Word list instruction - to be added.
NOTE: It is a large inventory of words used by many different children across a wide age range, so do not worry if your child knows only a few of them at the moment!
U = only understands U&S = understands and says
